name: Blobos World
description:
Play as blobo in this 3d Jello world! You are inside of a monster and you use your sick moves to traverse through the levels bouncing off jello platforms, collecting stars, and beat the monster! wasd to move , mouse 1 to dive , space to jump and space for jetpack

Game Developed in 2 weeks by a group of FIEA students

Dylan , Alexis, Greg, Nassir & Kyle !

*pc game download available below for better graphics*
